class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ans = 0
        cur = False
        n = len(colors)
        i = 0
        prev = -1
        while i < n:
            if i < prev:break
            if not cur:
                val = True    
                for j in range(i + 1,i + k):
                    if colors[j % n] == colors[(j - 1) % n]:
                        val = False
                        prev = i
                        i = (j % n)
                        break
                if val:
                    cur = True
                    ans += 1
                    prev = i
                    i += 1
            else:
                next = (i + k - 1) % n
                prev = (next - 1) % n
                if colors[next] != colors[prev]:
                    ans += 1
                    prev = i
                    i += 1
                else:
                    cur = False
                    prev = i
                    i = next
        return ans
